text: Bourg-Saint-Andéol is a small commune of the Ardèche département in the Rhône Valley in the southern part of France. It is the capital of a canton in the arrondissement of Privas, with a population of about 8,000 as of the year 1999. ==Twin cities== *Monschau in Germany (Eifel) since 1975 *Albertirsa in Hungary since 1998 *Gaggiano in Italy since 2002 ==Related pages== *Communes of the Ardèche department Category:Communes in Ardèche
title: Bourg-Saint-Andéol
